ch0110_10_kasumi/0101_0701_02_10: I can’t wait to go exploring with you again!
ch0110_10_kasumi/7101_0701_01_10:
Isn’t this sygna suit just the cutest outfit ever?
It flutters just like Vaporeon’s tail!
ch0110_10_kasumi/7101_0701_02_10:
Imagine how elegant the two of us would look
swimming in the ocean together!
ch0110_10_kasumi/7102_0701_01_10:
My Vaporeon is super energetic and a bit of
a rascal!
ch0110_10_kasumi/7102_0701_02_10:
The other day, she splashed around so much during
our training that I got drenched from head to toe!
ch0110_10_kasumi/7103_0701_01_10:
Since I’m wearing such a fancy-looking outfit, I
feel like I need to act a little more refined!
ch0110_10_kasumi/7103_0701_02_10:
I even got these fancy earrings to help pull off
the elegant look I’m going for! Look how sparkly
they are!
ch0110_10_kasumi/7103_0701_03_10:
But...whenever I see the ocean, I have to resist the
urge to just dive in. Even though I really want to!
ch0110_10_kasumi/7104_0701_01_10:
Hm? My secret to winning? Why, all you need is
a policy about Pokémon!
ch0110_10_kasumi/7104_0701_02_10:
Once you have that, you’ll never hesitate in battle.
And that’ll make your partner Pokémon feel more
confident, too!
ch0110_10_kasumi/7104_0701_03_10:
In case you’re wondering, my policy is an all-out
offensive with well-trained Water-type Pokémon!
ch0110_10_kasumi/7105_0701_01_10:
My Gym is in Cerulean City—famous for its
pristine water!
ch0110_10_kasumi/7105_0701_02_10:
I’ve got a huge pool in my Gym. It’s the perfect
environment for Water-type Pokémon to show off
what they can do in battle!
ch0110_10_kasumi/7105_0701_03_10:
You should come visit me sometime,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0110_10_kasumi/1701_0701_01_10: Hey. I got something for ya!
ch0110_10_kasumi/1701_0702_01_10:
You’re handy with items, so I know you’ll come up
with a way to put that to good use!
ch0110_10_kasumi/2501_0701_01_10:
My Vaporeon is always getting into some kind
of mischief.
ch0110_10_kasumi/2501_0701_02_10:
But I guess playing pranks is her way of showing
how much she cares.
ch0110_10_kasumi/2501_0701_03_10:
That’s why, in the end, I usually just enjoy the fun
and laugh along with her.
ch0110_10_kasumi/2501_0702_01_10:
If you make eye contact with people while talking
to them, you can sometimes get on the
same wavelength.
ch0110_10_kasumi/2501_0702_02_10:
Wanna try it out? If I look into your eyes real
careful like so...
ch0110_10_kasumi/2501_0702_03_10:
I knew it—you want to battle me! And know
what? I’d be more than happy to take you on!
ch0110_10_kasumi/2511_0701_01_10:
I hear there are tons of unique Gyms in
other regions!
ch0110_10_kasumi/2511_0701_02_10: Some are even museums and fancy restaurants!
ch0110_10_kasumi/2511_0701_03_10:
Doesn’t that sound super chic? I’d love to go see
them for myself!
ch0110_10_kasumi/2511_0702_01_10:
Y’know, I wonder if I should turn Cerulean Gym
into a water park!
ch0110_10_kasumi/2511_0702_02_10:
That way, everyone could enjoy Pokémon battles
and have fun with attractions, too!
ch0110_10_kasumi/2511_0702_03_10:
If I ever do that, I’ll let you know. You can be the
first person to try it all out!
ch0110_10_kasumi/3001_0701_01_10:
Oh, are you still feeling a little groggy? Swimming
a lap around Pasio should wake you right up!
ch0110_10_kasumi/3003_0701_01_10:
I swam so much that now I’m starving! I know a
good place for lunch. Care to join me?
ch0110_10_kasumi/3005_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I imagine myself swimming elegantly in
the moonlight with Vaporeon. I bet we’d be pretty
as a painting!
